mapper.sql: a.leibie AS "leibie", a.fenlei_id AS "fenleiId", a.id AS "id", a.bianma AS "bianma", a.name AS "name", a.guige AS "guige", a.chandi AS "chandi", a.jisuandanwei AS "jisuandanwei", a.shuoming AS "shuoming", a.xiangmutexing AS "xiangmutexing", a.shoufeileixing AS "shoufeileixing", a.fuwuduixiang AS "fuwuduixiang", a.pingbifeibie AS "pingbifeibie", a.shifoubianjia AS "shifoubianjia", a.jiabanjiajia AS "jiabanjiajia", a.buchongzhaiyao AS "buchongzhaiyao", a.feiyongqueren AS "feiyongqueren", a.zhixingkeshi AS "zhixingkeshi", a.biaoshizhuma AS "biaoshizhuma", a.biaoshizima AS "biaoshizima", a.beixuanma AS "beixuanma", a.zuidixiandu AS "zuidixiandu", a.zuigaoxiane AS "zuigaoxiane", a.jiandangshijian AS "jiandangshijian", a.chedangshijian AS "chedangshijian", a.luruxianliang AS "luruxianliang", a.jisuanfangshi AS "jisuanfangshi", a.zhandian AS "zhandian", a.binganfeimu AS "binganfeimu", a.qiyongyuanyin AS "qiyongyuanyin", a.tingyongyuanyin AS "tingyongyuanyin"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO useable_shoufeixiangmumulu( leibie, fenlei_id, id, bianma, name, guige, chandi, jisuandanwei, shuoming, xiangmutexing, shoufeileixing, fuwuduixiang, pingbifeibie, shifoubianjia, jiabanjiajia, buchongzhaiyao, feiyongqueren, zhixingkeshi, biaoshizhuma, biaoshizima, beixuanma, zuidixiandu, zuigaoxiane, jiandangshijian, chedangshijian, luruxianliang, jisuanfangshi, zhandian, binganfeimu, qiyongyuanyin, tingyongyuanyin ) VALUES ( #{leibie}, #{fenleiId}, #{id}, #{bianma}, #{name}, #{guige}, #{chandi}, #{jisuandanwei}, #{shuoming}, #{xiangmutexing}, #{shoufeileixing}, #{fuwuduixiang}, #{pingbifeibie}, #{shifoubianjia}, #{jiabanjiajia}, #{buchongzhaiyao}, #{feiyongqueren}, #{zhixingkeshi}, #{biaoshizhuma}, #{biaoshizima}, #{beixuanma}, #{zuidixiandu}, #{zuigaoxiane}, #{jiandangshijian}, #{chedangshijian}, #{luruxianliang}, #{jisuanfangshi}, #{zhandian}, #{binganfeimu}, #{qiyongyuanyin}, #{tingyongyuanyin} )
mapper.update: UPDATE useable_shoufeixiangmumulu SET leibie = #{leibie}, fenlei_id = #{fenleiId}, bianma = #{bianma}, name = #{name}, guige = #{guige}, chandi = #{chandi}, jisuandanwei = #{jisuandanwei}, shuoming = #{shuoming}, xiangmutexing = #{xiangmutexing}, shoufeileixing = #{shoufeileixing}, fuwuduixiang = #{fuwuduixiang}, pingbifeibie = #{pingbifeibie}, shifoubianjia = #{shifoubianjia}, jiabanjiajia = #{jiabanjiajia}, buchongzhaiyao = #{buchongzhaiyao}, feiyongqueren = #{feiyongqueren}, zhixingkeshi = #{zhixingkeshi}, biaoshizhuma = #{biaoshizhuma}, biaoshizima = #{biaoshizima}, beixuanma = #{beixuanma}, zuidixiandu = #{zuidixiandu}, zuigaoxiane = #{zuigaoxiane}, jiandangshijian = #{jiandangshijian}, chedangshijian = #{chedangshijian}, luruxianliang = #{luruxianliang}, jisuanfangshi = #{jisuanfangshi}, zhandian = #{zhandian}, binganfeimu = #{binganfeimu}, qiyongyuanyin = #{qiyongyuanyin}, tingyongyuanyin = #{tingyongyuanyin} WHERE id = #{id}
